cohort.name: Follow-Up Efficiency for New Consults
cohort.story: Among our cohort of 299 users, we observed that 11% did not create a first consult within 48 hours. This indicates a potential gap in timely follow-up actions, which could lead to delays in patient care. Addressing this could streamline workflows and enhance overall productivity.
